alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 3:59PM EST until December 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds near 25 mph, with frequent gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 30 to 39 mph, or frequent gusts in excess of 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Wind gusts along the Overseas Highway will be highest on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Motorists should be alert for sudden gusts of wind, especially on bridges, which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle. Use extra caution. Residents should secure trash cans, lawn furniture, holiday decorations, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
